testcase.classname: To book the hotel from AdactinHotel app and then get the order id
testcase.name: To book a hotel from Adactin hotel app
testcase.system-out: Given User is in adactin login page.........................................passed When User enter valid username and password and click login button..........passed And User select location, hotels, room type, number of rooms, Indate, Outdate, adult room, child room and click search button.passed And User select radio button and click continue button......................passed And User enter first name, last name, address, creditcard number, creditcard type, month, year, cvv number and click booknow button.passed Then User must get the order id.............................................passed
